resources.string:
Linear Function:

 1. Click F1 and you can see a blue star is next to F1. 

 2. Input a number into first edit-text area and then click corresponded button (X,Y,Z) for one time, you can see the formula is generated below.
 
 3. click F2 and then you can see a blue star is next to F2.

 4. Repeat step 3 to get your second function.

 5. Click Solve. If the functions can be solved, you can get the answers in the "Answer" column. Or there is no solution for the function. 

 6. Click Clear Button, you can clear all the data.
\nHi everyone. I am the creator Sandy. I will update more function solvers later. You can contact me and tell me what kind of functions you need. Have a good day.
